grails.gorm
[Groovy] Class DetachedCriteria

java.lang.Object
  grails.gorm.DetachedCriteria
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryableCriteria, java.lang.Cloneable, GormOperations, java.lang.Iterable
@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class DetachedCriteria
extends java.lang.Object

Represents criteria that is not bound to the current connection and can be built up and re-used at a later date.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0

Nested Class Summary
class DetachedCriteria.DetachedProjections

where

DetachedCriteria where(groovy.lang.Closure additionalQuery)
Where method derives a new query from this query. This method will not mutate the original query, but instead return a new one.
Parameters:

Returns:
A new query
